Text: Scheduling Wheelabrator Cc When you are scheduling the two Wheelabrator units please use the following counterparties in CAPS MARTELAMFOR Wheelabrat WSENGYUnit WheelSHAST We account for these separately and thus they need to be scheduled as two separate entities In Enpower there are two counterparties set up as well MARTELAMFOR WHEELABRMA WSENGYUnit WHEELABRSH Thanks and let me know if you have any questions Kourtney

Scheduling Wheels Cc Just a reminder that when entering a wheel the Interchange ID must be the same for the import and export When the Import is labeled as EPMICISO and the Export as CISOEPMI the ISO views these as unique imports and exports They will not be linked together for a wheel thus causing ancillary services charges to occur Thank you

Reminder Cc All When sending emails in regards to cuts or other things that occur in RT please send the emails to our entire group The address is VolumeManagementPortland Thank you it helps our process greatly Kourtney

FERC orderNonPrivilegedpst Hey just wanted to clarify the capping in the new order During nonemergency hours the regionwide cap is at of the highest price bid during the last Stage emergency During emergency hours the price mitigation rules are the samebased on the operating costs of the leastefficient generator Good to chat with you this morning I hope that things start to look up soon Ill keep my fingers crossed

FW MIF Meeting right nowNonPrivilegedpst Original Message From Almeida Keoni ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESAlmeidaCKeoniCKAlmeidacaisoEcomE NRONcom Sent Tuesday June AM To Nelson Kourtney Subject RE MIF Meeting Yes Original Message From Happ Susan Sent Friday June AM To ISO Market Participants Subject CAISO Notification Second Notice June MIF Meeting Tuesday June Importance High Market Participants Attached is the agenda for the Market Issues Forum MIF Stakeholder Meeting scheduled for Tuesday June The MIF meeting will begin at am and conclude at pm Lunch will be provided please confirm RSVP The MIF conference call option information is as follows If you plan to attend this meeting and have not previously RSVPd please RSVP to Sue Happ via email at or via telephone no later than Monday June Sue Happ on behalf of Kyle Hoffman Manager Client Relations Keoni Almeida California Independent System Operator phone pager alpha page email mailto Original Message From Nelson Kourtney mailtoKourtney NRONcom Sent Monday June PM To Keoni Almeida Email Subject MIF Meeting Keoni Is this the callin number for the MIF meeting tomorrow Thanks Kourtney

Real Time Notes Cc NonPrivilegedpst Real Time group When you are sending notes in regards to cuts supplemental activity etc to the Volume Management group please send it via our email distribution list DLPortland Volume Mgmt This ensures that all of the proper people receive the information Let me know if you have any questions and thank you Kourtney

HOW TO Cc NonPrivilegedpst All To access the distribution list hit the TO button and type in DLPortland Volume Mgmt There is also a DLPortland Real Time Shift Chis Murray and Donna will have rights to change this list and will add Eugene and Marina when the request is approved Let me know if you have any questions Kourtney

FW OOM ChargesNonPrivilegedpst FYI We are ok on exports see Keonis note below KN Original Message From Almeida Keoni ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESAlmeidaCKeoniCKAlmeidacaisoEcomE NRONcom Sent Wednesday June AM To Nelson Kourtney Subject RE OOM Charges The underscheduling of load penalties are not in effect For exports there are no penalties for deviations Keoni Almeida California Independent System Operator phone pager alpha page email mailto Original Message From Nelson Kourtney mailtoKourtney NRONcom Sent Wednesday June AM To Keoni Almeida Email Cc Stokley Chris Subject OOM Charges Keoni As our group has researched all of these new Out of Market charges we have yet to see charges tied back to strictly to exports The Soft Cap PmtAllocation charges are based on underscheduled load and overscheduled generation CT relates only to generators The Underscheduled Load PenaltyRevenue charges apply to total load plus exports if there is a variance by more than For our nonload customers this would most likely only occur if the export schedule is cut The alternate way this might happen is if EPMI decreases load and exports the power Are there any other OOM penalties that we are missing Specifically any relating to exports I know how fun these things are to sort through thank you for your help Kourtney

IMCEANOTESIzarrarazCAliciaICIZARRAIbpEcomEENR NRONcom User unknown IMCEANOTESIzarrarazCAliciaICIZARRAIbpEcomEENR NRONcom User unknown ATTTXT MessageID From Almeida Keoni To Foster Chris ChrisH nroncom Izarraraz Alicia I ENRON IMCEANOTESIzarrarazCAliciaICIZARRAIbpEcomE NRONcom Subject FW Enron question on scheduling HA amounts Date Thu May MIMEVersion XMailer Internet Mail Service ContentType textplain We will change the Pmax to See note below Keoni Almeida California Independent System Operator phone pager alpha page email mailto Original Message From Ford Greg Sent Wednesday May PM To Almeida Keoni Cc Rothleder Mark Subject Enron question on scheduling HA amounts Keoni In our conversation Tuesday Enron asked about how they should set their Pmax rating for a unit given that they have to overgenerate above their Hour Ahead schedule to cover their GMM and that we might dispatch them the difference between Pmax and their HA schedule to comply with the FERC order Example Enron has a MW unit that can reliably operate at MW Their GMM is or about MW of losses They usually submit an HA schedule of MW and generate at MW to cover the GMM In this particular case the resource is fuellimited so that they cant usually generate at their maximum output The answer from the compliance department is A unit should set their Pmax at the level that they are capable of generating at The ISO should be notified immediately if there is an outage or derate that would prevent the unit from operating at its Pmax otherwise it will be presumed to be available A unit that keeps the ISO apprised of its availability in realtime and performs in accordance with its bid characteristics when dispatched should not receive penalties A unit with a Final HA Schedule of MW that is dispatched for the additional MW and generates MW according to meter data will not be penalized under CT The Total Obligation for CT for a unit that is dispatched for Incremental Energy is Final HA Schedule of Instructed Incremental Energy The Total Obligation for the hour is compared to the hourly meter value for that unit and is not adjusted for transmission losses ie GMM is not taken into account Currently penalties for failure to perform are assessed on an hourly basis however CT may be assessed on an interval basis in the future So the Total Obligation for the unit is MW MW of MW MW which is less than the meter of MW For CT purposes this unit will not receive any penalties It is important to note that there is a tolerance or MW for Instructed Energy less than MW on CT penalties If the unit is instructed for less than MW MW will be taken off of the Instructed Incremental Energy instead of This means that any unit that has an Incremental Instruction for MW or less would not be flagged for CT review For other Settlement charge types such as CT and No Pay charges on Spin NonSpin and Replacement a unit is required to provide the Instructed Energy plus any transmission losses in order to receive full credit for providing the Scheduled Energy and Ancillary Services Greg Ford California ISO Market Operations

FW Enron questionsNonPrivilegedpst Original Message From Almeida Keoni ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESAlmeidaCKeoniCKAlmeidacaisoEcomE NRONcom Sent Thursday May PM To Foster Chris H Nelson Kourtney Subject Enron questions Our folks are continuing to review all the questions However below is a section that been has responded to On any Day if the Must Offer Generator cannot generate the full PMax it must file a generation outage report in the form of Attachment to the CAISO Otherwise the full PMax is deemed to be available for dispatch by the ISO Q Is there any tolerance here given by the ISO For example if a PMax is MW and a Must Offer Generator can only do MW due to ambient temperature conditions must that Must Offer Generator submit an outage report for MW A Yes see next answer for detail Q Can such minor deviations be called in to the Generation outage desk rather than a report being filed A At this point there is no tolerance factor An Outage Report must be created for any change of state ie any factor impacting the maximum capability of the unit whether from a derate eg ambient temperature or an equipment outage If the derate is known in advance eg low water it may be submitted to the Outage Coordination Office If the derate surfaces only in the realtime it must be reported to the Generation Dispatcher who will create an Outage ticket At this time it should handled as an outage indicating that the unit is derated and for what cause and expected duration

RE Action ItemsNonPrivilegedpst Chris FYI Harbors October wire will be going out tomorrow in the amount that Foster noted below Melissa and I confirmed these numbers And Caroline went over the November numbers with Foster as well So I think we are getting the process down Hope youre having fun KN Original Message From Stokley Chris Sent Monday May AM To Nelson Kourtney Emmert Caroline Subject FW Action Items Kourtney and Caroline Could you make sure that both of the items listed below are taken care of along w updating Foster and myself upon completion Thanks Chris Original Message From Foster Chris H Sent Monday May AM To Stokley Chris Subject Action Items Chris Confirming our discussion there are things that I want to make sure happen Monday and Tuesday this week Harbor gets paid for Oct The amount is Caroline is going to get me final numbers for Nov Harbor so I can put in the Services Desk Profit Annuity C

FW Harbor Payment questionNonPrivilegedpst FYI Original Message From Ratnala Melissa Sent Friday May AM To Nelson Kourtney Subject Re Harbor Payment question Kourtney The ISO numbers were included in the payment per the attached schedule from Chris My apologies for waiting so long to reply back to you I have been in and out of the office this week If you have any other questions please let me know Thanks Melissa From Kourtney nronXgate on PM To Melissa K CT cc Chris nronXgate Subject Harbor Payment question Melissa I have a question in regards to the handling of Harbors ISO numbers with the recent payments made to them Were the ISO numbers included in the payment netting against any revenues and charges in the system through Enpower Or were these handled in a different manner I just want to make sure that I have an understanding of how they were handled Thank you Kourtney

SettleGen Tool updateNonPrivilegedpst All An error was discovered in SettleGeneration for Charge type Prior to the change the rate being pulled was always the Dec the logic in the formula was incorrect Now when the deviation mw are greater than zero they are paid the dec and when the deviation mw are less than zero the are buying the Inc This was tested with Caroline and Donnas approval The new tool is effective as of now and is properly names in the ISOandPX folder Thanks Kourtney

Harbor Payment question Cc NonPrivilegedpst Melissa I have a question in regards to the handling of Harbors ISO numbers with the recent payments made to them Were the ISO numbers included in the payment netting against any revenues and charges in the system through Enpower Or were these handled in a different manner I just want to make sure that I have an understanding of how they were handled Thank you Kourtney

Harbor Question Cc NonPrivilegedpst Chris Chris and I were discussing the Harbor October payment and we need a quick clarification on one point If you could please swing by on Monday so we can clear this up that would be great Thanks Kourtney

Settle Wheeling CongNonPrivilegedpst All HA Wheeling Cong was calcing incorrectly Donna and I made a change to how the charge was being calculated as follows OLD HA Export Wheeling MW HA Import Price HA Import Wheeling MW HA Export Price NEW HA Import Wheeling MW HA Import Price HA Export Wheeling MW HA Export Price Thus effective at COB today the new Settle will be in production Let Donna or I know if you have any questions Kourtney

Payment questions Cc NonPrivilegedpst Rod I received your voicemail this morning I was out of the office yesterday for training and that training continues today Wednesday I will be back in the office tomorrow and will call you then If you have any immediate concerns please contact my manager Chris Stokley at Thanks Kourtney

Wheelabrator Martel payment Cc NonPrivilegedpst Godfrey Thank you for your message this morning in regards to the payment made in December I would prefer if you outlined the details of the payment in an email in order for me to clearly understand and be able to explain to my customer what the payment entails Also you mentioned demand charge in your message could you be more specific to what the various demand charges relate to That would be very helpful Thank you Kourtney

WheelSHAST GreenCredits Cc NonPrivilegedpst Tracy I researched the Green Credits deals for I spoke with Chris Foster and he looked at the contracts The prices for the months are as follows August September October November December Here is my record of the what the GreenCredit payments should be and I have confirmed that these match the spreadsheets on the EnronWest site August no sheet on EWest for this month September October November I updated the EWest spreadsheet the price was already correct in our system December Thus the September and October payments are incorrect due to the price variance I changed the deals in our system and am checking with my manager as to how we will handle paying this incremental amount I calculate that we owe you for September and for October a total payment of I will get back to you by the end of the day Friday and let you know how we will pay you for these Thank you for bringing this to my attention and I apologize for any inconvenience Kourtney

Wheelabrator Martel Dec Wire Cc NonPrivilegedpst Godfrey Our counterparty Wheelabrator Martel has asked me to look into the wire payment made on Dec in an amount of I received an email from Audrey confirming that a wire for this amount was to be sent on the th This payment was for the Forward energy payment for the month of November as well as the Novembers Green Credit payment The forward energy payment which I pulled from a CARP is The Green Credit payment is This totals Audrey added the following note Wheelabrator Martel Includes adjustment to Green Credit already paid of for October The new adjusted amount was Therefore an amount due Enron of was generated But even with this note I can not tie back the payment amount of If you could please assist me in researching the variance I would greatly appreciate it I realize that you are still working on monthend but I would like this resolved by tomorrow if possible Thank you Kourtney

GodfreyNonPrivilegedpst Chris I believe that you know what things have come up in our dealings with Godfrey but I wanted to reiterate them via email We send out wires on the th for each of the generators energy payments from the prior month I sent an email to Audrey and Godfrey stating the amounts to be paid on the th Normal procedure is for Audrey to send an email to each of the customers prior to the wire in order for their AR to prepare for them Audrey gave Godfrey the contact list that I had created for her Godfrey sent emails to customers on the th but there were two emails that went to wrong customers Thus payment amounts were given to wrong customers I believe that this was due to a tech person working on his email but obviously not something to be repeated next month This is the major dealing that I have had thus far w Godfrey He has always been really concerned about getting things right when Ive talked with him So I think that he really wants to do a good job but he just really does not have enough knowledge yet to do a good job I will be working w Chris Foster to pay Harbor for July August and September activity I will let you know how that goes KN

ROUGH DRAFT Harbor ProcessNonPrivilegedpst ChrisMurray Please review and let me know what you think and what I missed Thanks KN All At the conclusion of yesterdays meeting I felt there was still some room for us to clarify the situation with Harbor I have summarized below what the Volume Management team concluded the process will be on a goforward basis starting in May On the nd to last business day Chris Foster will enter two annuities for the gas transaction The st annuity is for the West Gas to sell to West Services and the nd annuity is for West Services to sell to Harbor The amount of this annuity is based on the most current number Vivan Chen provides Chris and has zero financial affect on the WestServices book On the last business day of the month Risk calcs the months transactions taking into account the gas annuities and the Forward power deals which are entered on a daily basis Also included is the ISO Actualization for a prior month as well as an annuity entered by Chris Foster to account for the West Services shared savings for this prior month this shared savings calc is from a spreadsheet that takes into account all the costs that Harbor informs Chris Foster of and will never be a loss to the West Services book th of following month update both gas annuities by production month th of following month send separate invoicespayments sent to Harbor for gas and forward power For the cleanup of months prior Chris Foster and Kourtney will go over the July through September spreadsheets in order to determine the deal entry and cleanup that needs to occur Please respond to all with additional commentsammendments Thanks Kourtney

CustomerReportupdate Cc poNonPrivilegedpst Anna I just left you a message but thought I would outline the problem that arose We are running the CustomerReportupdate tool for the month of April for each of the generation customers Upon running Wheelabrat we found that the meter is not dumping after HE on April The query that pulls the meter is in the Settle database and is called qryGenCustMeter and when I ran it I came back with no data My guess is that it all goes back to the DLS time issue Ive looked at it as much as I could and dont know what to do to fix it Im a little confused bc you fixed a DLS time issue earlier in the month and I ran it wout this problem Let me know what else you need from me Thanks Kourtney

CAPS CP NAMES Cc poNonPrivilegedpst Dave Hope youre enjoying Houston The weather is probably alot better than it is here big surprise Im a little concerned about the CP names in CAPS Today when I was looking at the GenSchedules for there were a few CP names that were different from prior days HARBOR came across as HARBORCOG and SierraPowe came across as SIERRAPWR This is only an issue bc our lookup tables search for specific names I do not understand why names are changing in CAPS to their names in Enpower If you could look into this and let me know if there is anything I can do to help please let me know Thanks Dave Kourtney

SettleGeneration Cc NonPrivilegedpst Anna I ran SettleGen for and These appeared to return meter data in correct form I then ran SettleGen for and these are the results I received HE meter data HE HE HE meter data HE meter data HE I understand that with the Daylight savings there is a one hour shift thus explaining the HE on finishing HE on I confirmed that there is meter data available for There is no meter available for thats another issue It seems that the pull is skipping a whole day One other thing that I checked I pulled meter from the Settledb from qyrMeterDstGenInterval for and ran SettleGen for The qyr meter data HE is equal to the SettleGen data for HE If you could please call me at your earliest convenience so we can get this taken care of today if possible THANK YOU ANNA Kourtney

Re URGENT ERROR Load Meter Data Failed Effective Date LATE CUSTOMER FILES FOUND Cc NonPrivilegedpst Pete I called Glenna and she informed me that they are no longer in Folsom but are in Alhambra Apparently an email was sent to you and Chris in regards to this but I am not on this distribution list The new IP address is Chris will need to resend yesterdays Load meter files and I will need to pull the meter files Please Chris or myself a call when you get back in the office so we can get this squared away Thanks KN From Pete Davis AM To Chris StokleyHOUECT Kourtney CT cc Subject URGENT ERROR Load Meter Data Failed Effective Date LATE CUSTOMER FILES FOUND Chris Kourtney I think the ISO Meter system is not working I even tried running the Meter Scout manually and the confirmation still times out Contact Glenna and find out what is going on Im leaving for a funeral this morning so Ill be out of the office and pager range You can reach me by cell Pete Forwarded by Pete Energy Day Cc poNonPrivilegedpst Chris This is the activity I was telling you about last week it is on May th Lets chat about this when you get a chance Also my planned vacation this summer is June July We can figure out who will help with FlashMonth End once we bring the new people up to speed Thanks KN Forwarded by Kourtney NelsonPDXECT on AM Swarthout Sophia on AM To cc Subject Energy Day Kourtney How would you like to come join us in beautiful California for our annual Energy Day and represent Enron So what is Energy Day This is our th year of putting on it and its getting bigger and better each year We invite over kids th th and th graders from three counties to spend a day learning about every aspect of energy Because of the energy crisis we have had a tremendous response Adults as well as the kids are extremely interested in learning about what is going on the California We expect this year to be the largest ever Our plant is transformed into an Energy Carnival The kids play Energy Jeopardy Wheel of Fortune Crossword Word Relay Bingo etcall with questions designed to teach the kids about electricity We also have vendor alley where kids are introduced to solar wind geothermal and hydro companies Of course we would like the natural gas industry to be represented as well We are currently working to get as many vendors as possible so the kids have any array of booths to learn from To add to the event we have a presentation by the Fire Guy This is a minute presentation which has proven to be the highlight of the day Lastly we have a huge BBQ to feed all the kids We prepare hamburgers and Pepsi sponsors the drinks Needless to say this is quite an event We would love to have you come Its actually fun for the adults too especially if we have good weather Let me know what you think or if I should be contacting someone else Talk with you soon Sophia

Scheduling Wheels Cc NonPrivilegedpst Just a reminder that when entering a wheel the Interchange ID must be the same for the import and export When the Import is labeled as EPMICISO and the Export as CISOEPMI the ISO views these as unique imports and exports They will not be linked together for a wheel thus causing ancillary services charges to occur Thank you

FW Pub Posting FixNonPrivilegedpst FYI Original Message From Dunton Heather Sent Tuesday June PM To Nelson Kourtney Subject FW Pub Posting Fix You may want to pass this on to the group Original Message From Evans Casey Sent Tuesday June PM To Lewis Jon Paul Tisdale Marilyn Chen Hai Dahlke Andrea White Stacey Allen Thresa A Grace Rebecca M Vinson Donald Wayne Carter Tim Jacobson Michael Reeves Leslie Ratnala Melissa K Robinson Rhonda Cashion Jim Werner Joy Dunton Heather Chang Fran Postlethwaite John Law Samantha Durham Kim Mansfield Marci Lew Elsie Clemons Amy Confer Mark Murphy Melissa Ann Subject Pub Posting Fix To all Just wanted to pass on some good newsthere is a new release of Pub Posting in Enpower production that allows the user to export the settled prices into Excel Please pass this on to anyone who uses this tool that Ive missed Thanks Casey

Adjusted LR Balance Cc the adjusted LR Balance on the Enronwest site It is under the StaffKourtney Nelson There are two links Adj LR is the same dataformat from the weekly strategy meeting New Gen link has all of the supply side info that is used to calculate the LR balance Please note the Data Flag column a value of indicates the project was cancelled on hold etc and is not included in the calc Both of these sheets are interactive Excel spreadsheets and thus you can play around with the data as you please Also James Bruce is working to get his gen report on the web That will help with your access to information on new gen Please let me know if you have any questions or feedback Kourtney Kourtney Nelson Fundamental Analysis Enron North America

FW Capacity or Energy for Replacement Reserves Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst I confirmed w Keoni in relation to payments for Rplc Reserves The ISO will only pay the Capacity or Energy PaymentNOT both There are attachments describing this further or let me know if you have any questions Kourtney Original Message From Almeida Keoni mailto Sent Monday July AM To Nelson Kourtney Subject Capacity or Energy for Replacement Reserves It was part of Amendment which went into effect on Dec th FW ISO FERC Filing today Keoni Almeida California Independent System Operator phone pager alpha page email mailto Inline attachment follows From IMCEAEXOCAISOOUCORPORATECNRECIPIENTSCN To ISO Market Participants IMCEAEXOCAISOOUCORPORATECNDISTRIBUTIONLISTSCN Date Friday December GMT Subject Market Participants Attached please find Market Notice and part of the FERC filing that was made this afternoon Note that there will be a special conference call today at pm PST Details are in the Market Notice file below Market Noticedoc This is the transmittal letter redline cost data and affidavit of Jim Detmers Amendment No filing letterDOC Att BDOC Att BDOC Att BDOC Att CDOC Att DXLS Don Fuller Director Client Relations Sent on behalf of Don Fuller by Alice Leonard Alice Leonard Executive Assistant California Independent System Operator Ph Fax Email

Creating Customer Finals Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst Bill With the new system we need to rework the timelines of some jobs that pull data in The creation of Customer Finals must take place prior to our pulling in the schedules to create our estimates I am requesting that you implement a am deadline for Customer Finals to be created We will run our job at that time that pulls in schedules If the Customer Finals are not created by then our job will be run again at am We understand that there are special circumstances that arise and we can deal with those on a casebycase basis This is vital for us to have the finals created in this timeline and makes our lives much easier If you do not have any problems with this please pass on this request to the rest of the RT team and implement this timeline on tonights shift Otherwise please discuss with me and we can work w Pete to square this away Thank you for your attention to this I appreciate it Kourtney

FW CAISO Urgent Notice SI Servers UNAVAILABLE MONDAY July th to pst REMINDERBill NonPrivilegedpst FYI just wanted to make sure you and your team were aware of the outage Pete Davis and Dave Poston can answer any questions you may have Original Message From Glatz Michael mailto Sent Monday July AM To CRCommunications ISO Market Operations Group Market Status Cc TSWG Subject RE CAISO Urgent Notice SI Servers UNAVAILABLE MONDAY July th to pst REMINDER REMINDER Original Message From CRCommunications Sent Friday July PM To ISO Market Operations Group Market Status Cc TSWG Subject CAISO Urgent Notice SI Servers UNAVAILABLE MONDAY July th to pst ISO Market Participants Market Status Distribution URGENT NOTIFICATION SI Servers UNAVAILABLE MONDAY July th to pst as we will be DEPLOYING THE NEW SI RELEASE FOR OASIS REDESIGN COMPLETION Please submit all Hour Ahead schedules for July th HE and and Supplemental Energy schedules for and prior to pst Once the SI system is available Please point your webbrowsers to our Primary server in Folsom by utilizing the following URL iso Also please be advised that you should clear the Netscape cache close all open Netscape windows and restart Netscape before attempting to log onto the primary site Please contact Ginger Seitles or if you have any questions or concerns Thank you ISO Market Operations

FW Decremental Bidding Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst Chris I agree with Bills assessment as shown in the attachment Prior to submitting bids Vol Mgmt needs to know the agreed upon shared savings between EPMI and the specific customers so we can set up our tools to capture these correctly Please stop by to discuss Thanks Kourtney Original Message From Williams III Bill Sent Friday June AM To Foster Christopher Cocke Jr Stanley Cc Nelson Kourtney Subject Decremental Bidding Chris I attached a simple sheet outlining our basic process of decremental bidding From a RealTime standpoint we are ready to implement this process immediately I believe we have the tools in place to capture the revenue on the volume management side as well Kourtney Nelson is out of the office today but will return on Monday I feel we should involve her in the process when she returns Overall this is very similar to what we did last summer and should be relatively easy to implement Feel free to see me with questions Thanks Bill

Out of Office AutoReply Decremental BiddingBill NonPrivilegedpst I will be out of the office Wednesday June th through Friday June th returning on Monday If this is a settlements related question please contact Jim Reyes All other questions can be directed to Murray ONeil
